resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105276</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105276</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202635</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Defining Tyranny</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Definieren Von von Tyrannei</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Définir La Tyrannie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Definindo O Tyranny</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Definizione Della Tirannia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορισμός της τυραννίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Definir Tiranía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will focus on gathering support for and elaborating on ideas for an essay of definition on tyranny. Students will use examples from Social Sciences and from Shakespeare's Julius Caesar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer konzentrieren auf die Erfassung des
Supports für und das Ausarbeitn auf Ideen für einen Versuch der 
Definition auf Tyrannei. Kursteilnehmer verwenden Beispiele von 
den Sozialwissenschaften und von Julius Caesar Shakespeares.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants se concentreront sur recueillir le 
soutien de et élaborer sur des idées pour un essai de définition 
sur la tyrannie. Les étudiants utiliseront des exemples des 
sciences sociales et de Jules César de Shakespeare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes focalizarão em recolher a 
sustentação para e em elaborar em idéias para um essay da 
definição no tyranny. Os estudantes usarão exemplos das 
ciências sociais e de Julius Caesar de Shakespeare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi metteranno a fuoco sul 
riunire il sostegno e sull'elaborazione sulle idee per un 
saggio della definizione sulla tirannia. Gli allievi useranno 
gli esempi dalle scienze sociali e da Julius Caesar dello Shakespeare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα εστιάσουν στη συλλογή της υποστήριξης
για και τη διαμόρφωση στις ιδέες για ένα δοκίμιο του καθορισμού 
στην τυραννία. Οι σπουδαστές θα χρησιμοποιήσουν τα 
παραδείγματα από τις κοινωνικές επιστήμες και από τον Ιούλιο 
Καίσαρα Shakespeare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes se centrarán en la acopio de la 
ayuda para y elaborar en las ideas para un ensayo de la definición en
tiranía. Los estudiantes utilizarán ejemplos de ciencias 
sociales y de Julio Caesar de Shakespeare.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>author</value>

        </lifeCycle>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105276</entry>
